sourcesContent:
export const CreatePasswordComponent = ({ password, setPassword, confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword, passwordPlaceholder, handlePasswordClick, handlePasswordBlur, confirmPlaceholder, handleConfirmClick, handleConfirmBlur, handleNextClick, passwordMismatchError, showPassword, togglePassword, confirmPasswordEmpty, confirmYourPassword, passwordMismatch, passwordAndConfirmEmpty }) => { return (

Create a strong password

Create a strong password with a mix of letters, numbers and symbols

{passwordAndConfirmEmpty &&

Enter a password

} {confirmPasswordEmpty &&

Confirm your password

} {passwordMismatchError && !confirmPasswordEmpty &&

Those passwords didn’t match. Try again.

}
); }
